presentationTable.name: Level Based Measures
presentationTable.description: This folder contains Revenue at a specific level of a dimension like Revenue at Month, Revenue at Year, Revenue for All Products and so on.

presentationColumns.name: 150  ---- Time Level Based ---------
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.150  ---- Time Level Based ---------
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

presentationColumns.name: 150  Rev  (Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.150  Rev  (Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric value for the full month. This aggregation is always calculated at the month level.. For example, when viewed against Week level, it shows the same total month's value for all the weeks in that month

presentationColumns.name: 151  Rev  (Full Qtr Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.151  Rev  (Full Qtr Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric value for the full quarter. This aggregation is always calculated at the quarter level. When viewed against Month or Week level, it shows the quarter's value for all the weeks and months in that quarter.

presentationColumns.name: 152  Rev  (Full Year Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.152  Rev  (Full Year Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric value for the full year. This aggregation is always calculated at the year level. When viewed against quarter, month or week level, it shows the year's value for all the quarters, month, and weeks in that year.

presentationColumns.name: 153  Rev  (Mago Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.153  Rev  (Mago Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Full month's value of the metric for the previous month. This aggregation is always calculated at the month level. For example, when viewed against Week level, it shows the same total month's value for all the weeks in that month.

presentationColumns.name: 154  Rev  (Yago Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.154  Rev  (Yago Full Mth Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Full month's value of the metric for the same month in the previous year. This aggregation is always calculated at the year level. For example, when viewed against Week level, it shows the same total month's value for all the weeks in that month.

presentationColumns.name: 155  Rev  (Yago Full Year Sum)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.155  Rev  (Yago Full Year Sum)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Full year's value of the metric for the previous year. This aggregation is always calculated at the year level

presentationColumns.name: 160  ---- Other Dims Level Based ---------
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.160  ---- Other Dims Level Based ---------
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

presentationColumns.name: 160  Rev  (Sum for All Customers)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.160  Rev  (Sum for All Customers)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric for all the Customers. It always returns the value at Total level irrespective of the level within the Customer dimension that is used in the query.

presentationColumns.name: 161  Rev  (Sum for All Offices)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.161  Rev  (Sum for All Offices)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric for all the Offices. It always returns the value at Total level irrespective of the level within the Office dimension that is used in the query.

presentationColumns.name: 162  Rev  (Sum for All Products)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.162  Rev  (Sum for All Products)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric for all the Products. It always returns the value at Total level irrespective of the level within the Product dimension that is used in the query.

presentationColumns.name: 163  Rev  (Sum for All Employees)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.163  Rev  (Sum for All Employees)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric for all the Employees. It always returns the value at Total level irrespective of the level within the Employee dimension that is used in the query.

presentationColumns.name: 164  Rev  (Sum for All Orders)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.164  Rev  (Sum for All Orders)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Sum of the metric for all the Customers. It always returns the value at Total level irrespective of the level within the Customer dimension that is used in the query

presentationColumns.name: 165  Rev  (Sum for All Dims But Time)

localization.localizationKey: 165  Rev  (Sum for All Dims But Time)

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App Exa.F5 Time Series and Level Based Examples.165  Rev  (Sum for All Dims But Time)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time. 

- Sum of the metric for all the dimensions except Time. It always returns the value at the Total level when viewed against all the dimensions except time.  When viewed against Time, it returns the value at that level.
